Windlord::

Windlord was stand up together a big metal object. Platns and weed 
almost covered it, plant's rooths were involing it and the task to 
free it would be hard.

THE OBJECT WAS A POD...!!!!

Windlord saw at Aerotaur and asked "Do you think that the spark is 
turned on?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> (What does inconfundible mean?)
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He nods and slowly circles downward in an attempt not to 
disturb Trinity. 
>  "Did you have nice dreams, little one?"  As he approaches the 
ground he puts 
> his large legs doun and returns to winged centaur mode.
